sablemarket-cay.name: Sablemarket Cay
sablemarket-cay.description: A floating pirate bazaar stitched from lashed docks, scavenged masts, and broken hulls; known for fences, duels, and rumor auctions.
sablemarket-cay.history: Session 1 opener location: the “Auction of Rumors,” where sealed bottles of secrets are sold.

sunken-crown.name: The Sunken Crown
sunken-crown.description: Tidal ruins visible only at extreme low tide, rumored to be from a pre-Crown civilization.
sunken-crown.history: A chart to the Sunken Crown appears at Sablemarket Cay; low tide in three days creates a time-limited expedition window.

sapphire-archipelago.name: The Sapphire Archipelago
sapphire-archipelago.description: A chain of warm-current islands and treacherous reefs where trade routes, forts, and pirate havens collide.
sapphire-archipelago.history: Core campaign setting; contested by the Crown, the Eastwater Company, and the Free Harbors League.
